mapper.select: SELECT /* selectList as MainController*/ USER_ID as userId, USER_PWD as userPwd, USER_NAME as userName, USER_NO as userNo, EMAIL as email, USE_YN as useYn, TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'yyyy') || '년 ' || TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'mm') || '월' || TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'dd') || '일 ' || TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'hh24') || '시' || TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'mi') || '분' as InsertDate, MODIFY_DATE as modifyDate FROM TUSER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND USER_PWD = #{userPwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TUSER /* saveSignupgo as MainController */ (USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, EMAIL, INSERT_DATE, MODIFY_DATE) VALUES (RPAD(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd'), 12, '0') || SEQ_USER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT /* selectInventory as MainController */ A.USER_NO, B.ITEM_NO, B.ITEM_LEVEL, C.ITEM_NAME, C.ITEM_INFO, C.ITEM_DMG, C.ITEM_DEF, B.DELETE_YN, C.ITEM_IMAGE1, C.ITEM_IMAGE2, C.ITEM_IMAGE3, C.ITEM_IMAGE4, C.ITEM_IMAGE5, B.ITEM_KEY FROM TUSER A, TINVENTORY B, TITEM C WHERE A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO AND B.ITEM_NO = C.ITEM_NO AND B.DELETE_YN = '0' AND A.USER_NO = #{userNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TCORONA /* insertCorona as MainController */ (CITY, DEF_CNT, INC_DEC, DEATH_CNT, ISOL_ING_CNT, ISOL_CLEAR_CNT, OVER_FLOW_CNT, LOCAL_OCC_CNT, STD_DAY, INSERT_DATE, MODIFY_DATE) VALUES (#{city, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{incDec, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{deathCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{isolIngCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{isolClearCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{overFlowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{localOccCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{stdDay, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT A.CITY, A.DEF_CNT, A.INC_DEC, A.DEATH_CNT, A.ISOL_ING_CNT, A.ISOL_CLEAR_CNT, A.OVER_FLOW_CNT, A.LOCAL_OCC_CNT, A.STD_DAY FROM TCORONA A WHERE TO_CHAR(A.INSERT_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24mi') = (SELECT TO_CHAR(MAX(B.INSERT_DATE), 'yyyymmddhh24mi') FROM TCORONA B)
